pages.text: Upgraded from $(l:justdirethings:tool_blazegold_hoe)Blazegold Hoe$(/l), Celestigem tools have Forge Energy instead of durability. This hoe creates Voidshimmer soil.$(br2)If the hoe has 'teleport drops' ability, and is bound to an inventory, the soil will teleport the autoharvested blocks to that inventory.
